nodes.text: A space station orbited the Garwian colony planet Stivic, serving as a merchant hub for the Garwian Unity. The station came under attack by pirates affiliated with the Lioaoin Regime. Senior Commander Thrawn of the Chiss Ascendancy witnessed the battle aboard the patrol cruiser Parala, but was unable to directly intervene, as such using modulated laserfire to inform the Garwians of the Lioaoin tactical weaknesses.
